      Starting function for server Calling server.run() will begin accepting remtoe requests until an exception is caught Each time a request is received, the thread pool executor assigns it to a thread

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server​(int portNumber,
              int threadNumber)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Class constructor
        Parameters:
        portNumber - specify which port to bind this server to
        threadNumber - specify how many threads will handle requests concurrently
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to bind to a server socket

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run​()
        Starting function for server Calling server.run() will begin accepting remtoe requests until an exception is caught Each time a request is received, the thread pool executor assigns it to a thread
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • setSize

        public void setSize​(int size)

      • setRoutes

        public void setRoutes​(Route base)
        Set the routes this server will function on ie http://yourdomain.com (/yourRoute) See the Route documentation for further information on how to define a route To define custom logic on this server software you must use server.setRoutes(Route base) before calling server.run()
        Parameters:
        base - base route for your server, typically "/"

      • initDB

        public Driving initDB​(java.lang.String url,
                      java.lang.String user,
                      java.lang.String password)
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        use this to initiate an SQL database for use with this server
        Parameters:
        url - SQL database link to connect to
        user - username
        password - password
        Returns:
        Driving, a class for interacting with the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws if no suitable driver found or other SQL problems encountered (ie no database at the supplied url)
